inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: patient's core biopsy revealed a 1.8 cm infiltrating ductal breast carcinoma

inclusion.criterion: Received surgical treatment in this institution
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Lumpectomy was done and the surgical margins were clear.

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The tumor was HER2-positive and ER/PR negative.

inclusion.criterion: No clear evidence of distant metastasis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Agree to participate in the trial and receive long-term follow-up
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: She is using “well women” multivitamins daily

exclusion.criterion: Patients who had simultaneous bilateral breast cancer
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Follow-up interval being less than 12 months except reaching endpoints of observation
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: She is using “well women” multivitamins daily

notes: Patient has a history of smoking and occasional alcohol consumption, but no other significant medical conditions mentioned.
